titleInfo.title: La. State University and A. and M. College. The Pentagon

mods.abstract: Pentagon Barracks exterior view from their central courtyard southwest toward Building B. Handwritten on front- La. State University and A. and M. College. The Pentagon. The Barracks are brick buildings with broad galleries in front and rear supported by massive brick columns. Four buildings occupy four sides of a pentagon, with the fifth side opening out to the Mississippi River. The rooms on the ground floors were used as classrooms, offices, reading rooms, armories; those on the second floor were occupied by cadets.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: LSU Photograph Collection, 1886-1926, Louisiana State University Archives, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, LA.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.

extension.hardwareSoftware: Scanned with Digibook 1000 at 300 ppi; saved as a TIFF and converted to JPEG2000
